value.title: DAX Fridays! #179: Use a slicer to highlight values instead of filter them in Power BI 😎
value.excerpt: Did you know that you can use a slicer in Power BI to highlight values instead of filtering them?  Let me show you the technique here, but if you are up for it, give it a go before and let us know what you came up to!  Pass multiple values from a slicer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_k_Qxb6pyCc  iscrossfilter

value.title: DAX fridays! #19: DIVIDE
value.excerpt: Let's go through DIVIDE() function available in DAX!  The DIVIDE function performs divisions and returns alternate result or BLANK() on division by 0.It is faster than the simple division operator.  NEXT VIDEO: - PREVIOUS VIDEO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SsZseKOgrWQ   Looking for a download file?

value.title: DAX Fridays! #66: TREATAS
value.excerpt: In this video we will go through the DAX function TREATAS.  The TREATAS DAX function allows us to create virtual relationships within tables or pass filters to tables that are not related.  Link to function in glossary:  https://curbal.com/blog/glossary/treatas-dax   Link to SQLBI blog post: https://www.sqlbi.com/articles/propagate-filters-using-treatas-in-dax/
